events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to an incorrect item delivered.
Assigning the case to the refund support specialist for further assistance and processing.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the problem?
Sure, my order number is 789654123 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got in the package.
Thank you for the info. We will process a full refund to your payment method and arrange a free return for the wrong item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and for covering the return shipping costs.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days. Return label emailed.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your recent support experience with us.
